thread.title: Post Divorce w/ kids living arrangement
thread.title_full: Post Divorce w/ kids living arrangement

author: Sibley
text:
You're paycheck to paycheck, there are two ways to fix this. Increase income or decrease expenses. Or both. In the end, the only way out of your situation is through - and there aren't any magical shortcuts.
What's your job/skills/education/qualifications? What options do you have to improve your income?
What's your expenses? Do a case study, even if you don't share it with us you need to know where you stand.
In the meantime, look into if you qualify for any social services, federal, state or local. Food stamps, utility assistance, etc.
Do not risk custody of your children by risking homelessness. Your dreams do not outweigh your children's needs. There is a better way, you just need to find it.
